element_names_for(page_layout)

[Source]

   # File lib/page_layout.rb, line 3
3:   def self.element_names_for(page_layout)
4:     page_layouts = self.get_layouts
5:     layout_description = page_layouts.detect { |p| p["name"].downcase == page_layout.downcase }
6:     raise "No Layout Description for #{page_layout} found! in page_layouts.yml" if layout_description.blank?
7:     layout_description["elements"]
8:   end

[Source]

    # File lib/page_layout.rb, line 10
10:   def self.get_layouts
11:     if File.exists? "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/page_layouts.yml"
12:       layouts = YAML.load_file( "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/page_layouts.yml" )
13:     elsif File.exists? "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/page_layouts.yml"
14:       layouts = YAML.load_file( "#{RAILS_ROOT}/config/alchemy/page_layouts.yml" )
15:     else
16:       raise "Could not read page_layouts.yml"
17:     end
18:     layouts
19:   end
get_layouts_for_select(language, options = {})

[Source]

    # File lib/page_layout.rb, line 25
25:   def self.get_layouts_for_select(language, options = {})
26:     array = []
27:     if options[:newsletter]
28:       self.get_layouts.each do |layout|
29:         if layout["newsletter"] == true
30:           array << [layout["display_name"], layout["name"]]
31:         end
32:       end
33:     else
34:       self.get_layouts.each do |layout|
35:         used = layout["unique"] && self.has_another_page_this_layout?(layout["name"], language)
36:         if !(layout["hide"] == true) && !used && !(layout["newsletter"] == true)
37:           display_name = (layout["display_name"].blank? ? layout["name"].camelize : layout["display_name"])
38:           array << [display_name, layout["name"]]
39:         end
40:       end
41:     end
42:     array
43:   end
get_page_layout_names()

[Source]

    # File lib/page_layout.rb, line 45
45:   def self.get_page_layout_names
46:     a = []
47:     self.get_layouts.each{ |l| a << l.keys.first}
48:     a
49:   end
has_another_page_this_layout?( layout, language)

[Source]

    # File lib/page_layout.rb, line 51
51:   def self.has_another_page_this_layout?( layout, language)
52:     !Page.find(:all, :conditions => {:page_layout => layout, :language => language}).blank?
53:   end
